episodes.title: When Theosophy Fails: Flying Saucers and the Defining of Cognitive Dissonance
episodes.description:
This is the audio version of an essay in my series on the history of flying saucer cults. In this episode, we examine one of the earliest groups of UFO believers, “The Seekers.” Observed by social scientists while their doomsday prophecy failed, they have become one of the most famous experiments in the history of psychology, but their beliefs all derived from the influences of Christian Theosophy.  

The archived text version is available to premium subscribers: https://www.osborneink.com/p/when-theosophy-fails-flying-saucers

episodes.title: Science, Fiction, and the Magician: How L. Ron Hubbard Conjured Scientology
episodes.description:
This is the audio version of my essay on the history of Scientology and the history of belief in extraterrestrials. All religions are pastiches of ideas, beliefs, and rituals from the past. Lafayette Ronald Hubbard invented his religion out of available material just like any other prophet. As a result, it has many things in common with the UFO cults.

Link to text: https://www.osborneink.com/p/science-fiction-and-the-magician

episodes.title: 'Psychic Dictatorship': The New Age Cult that Worships the American Flag
episodes.description:
This is the audio version of an essay in a series on the history of the belief in extraterrestrials in American religion. Guy and Edna Ballard led the ‘I AM Activity,’ a Christian Theosophy cult, during the Great Depression. Their strange spirituality has shaped many subsequent New Age religions, especially the UFO cults.

Link to text version: https://www.osborneink.com/p/psychic-dictatorship-the-new-age

episodes.title: Science of the Soul: Theosophy, Therapy, and the Evolution of the UFO Cults
episodes.description:
This is the audio version of my essay on the transference of spiritual ideas from Theosophy to the psychoanalytic profession in the 20th century, and how the UFO cults formed from the ‘bricolage’ of beliefs passed down from forgotten sources.

Link to text version: https://www.osborneink.com/p/science-of-the-soul-theosophy-therapy
